text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/claimcareteamrole
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    primaryPrimary providerThe primary care provider.
    supervisorSupervising ProviderSupervising care provider.
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/CodeSystem/C4BBClaimCareTeamRole
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    performingPerforming providerThe performing or rendering provider
    purchasedservicePurchased ServiceA purchased service occurs when one provider purchases a service from another provider and then provides it to the patient, e.g. a diagnostic exam
    referringReferringThe referring physician

name: C4BBClaimProfessionalAndNonClinicianCareTeamRole
title: C4BB Claim Professional And Non Clinician Care Team Role
description: Describes functional roles of the care team members
